item.title: Tommy Tynjä
item.description: Senior software engineer and continuous delivery consultant at Diabol. An advocate of open source software, continuous delivery, test-driven development, automation and tools that boost developer productivity and get software shipped faster. Specializing in systems running on the Java platform. Has been contributing to various open source projects over the years, such as Arquillian and Apache TomEE. Currently maintainer of the Jenkins Delivery Pipeline plugin. Co-founder of the Continuous Delivery Stockholm meetup group.
